thread.title: Gordon Thomson
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Gordon Thomson

author: Gordon Thomson
title: Gordon Thomson
text:
Shower Doc delivered the correct part, promptly and well packaged.
This is maybe a little much to ask for, but for five stars, I'd want fitting instructions. These may have been on the Shower Doc site, somewhere, but I couldn't find them.
Otherwise very happy (and the fact that they sought my feedback is appreciated).
